collages.name: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University
collages.description: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University is a well-known institution in Surat. It offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs. The campus is located in the heart of the city.

collages.name: Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology, Surat
collages.description: Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology (SVNIT) is a premier engineering college in Surat. It offers B.Tech programs in various disciplines. SVNIT has a strong reputation for academic excellence and research.

collages.name: AURO University
collages.description: AURO University is a private university in Surat. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various fields, including management, law, and liberal arts. The campus provides a conducive environment for holistic development.

collages.name: Bhagwan Mahavir University
collages.description: Bhagwan Mahavir University is a multidisciplinary institution in Surat. It offers programs in engineering, management, pharmacy, and other fields. The university focuses on practical learning and industry exposure.

collages.name: Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology
collages.description: Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology (SCET) is a renowned engineering college in Surat. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in engineering and technology. SCET emphasizes research and innovation.

collages.name: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Surat
collages.description: Indian Institute of Information Technology (IIIT), Surat, is an institute of national importance. It offers B.Tech programs in computer science and electronics. IIIT Surat focuses on cutting-edge research and technology.

collages.name: C. K. Pithawala College of Engineering and Technology
collages.description: C. K. Pithawala College of Engineering and Technology is an engineering college in Surat. It provides undergraduate programs in various engineering disciplines. The college aims to produce skilled professionals.

collages.name: METAS of Seventh-day Adventist Colleges
collages.description: METAS of Seventh-day Adventist Colleges is a Christian institution in Surat. It offers programs in nursing, education, and other fields. The college promotes values-based education and community service.

collages.name: Shree Ramkrishna Institute Of Computer Education And Applied Sciences
collages.description: Aspiring for excellence through world class education, research & Innovation in contemporary and prospective sciences in the service of humanity.

collages.name: Sir P.T. Sarvajanik College of Science
collages.description: Sir P.T. Sarvajanik College of Science is a science graduation college in Surat, Gujarat, India. The college is affiliated to Veer Narmad south Gujarat University. The college offers under-graduate courses in chemistry, mathematics, physics, botany and zoology. It also provides post-graduate courses in chemistry, physics and botany and Phd. Courses in chemistry, physics and zoology.
